Alteration:aid_g_oncrit_shieldregen.Name: AID_G_OnCrit_ShieldRegen
Alteration:aid_g_oncrit_shieldregen.ItemName: On crit regain 2.64% of damage dealt as shields.

Alteration:aid_g_oncrit_spawnenergyproje.Name: AID_G_OnCrit_SpawnEnergyProjectiles
Alteration:aid_g_oncrit_spawnenergyproje.ItemName: Critical hits cause 7 exploding projectiles to scatter to the surrounding area. Can only occur every 3 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onequip_animalfriend.Name: AID_G_OnEquip_AnimalFriend
Alteration:aid_g_onequip_animalfriend.ItemName: While this weapon is held, wildlife will not attack unless provoked.

Alteration:aid_g_onheadshot_spawnsparkbu.Name: AID_G_OnHeadshot_SpawnSparkBurst_R
Alteration:aid_g_onheadshot_spawnsparkbu.ItemName: After 5 Headshots with this weapon, reduce your current health by 12.5% and deal 30-133 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.75 tile radius. Can only occur every 6 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onhitstreak_freeze.Name: AID_G_OnHitStreak_Freeze
Alteration:aid_g_onhitstreak_freeze.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon 7 times causes them to freeze for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been frozen or Bosses.  Can only occur every 2.5 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onhitstreak_spawnsparkb.Name: AID_G_OnHitStreak_SpawnSparkBurst_M
Alteration:aid_g_onhitstreak_spawnsparkb.ItemName: Hitting an enemy 4 times with this weapon reduces your current health by 8% and deals 26-151 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.5 tile radius. Can only occur every 4 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_applyhuntersmark.Name: AID_G_OnHit_ApplyHuntersMark
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_applyhuntersmark.ItemName: Keeping the bow drawn past max charge will fire an arrow that debuffs the target, increasing their damage taken from all sources by 20% for 10 seconds. Does not affect Bosses.

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_chargestormkingha.Name: AID_G_OnHit_ChargeStormKingHammer
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_chargestormkingha.ItemName: Hitting an enemy empowers Meteor Slam to summon meteors that each deal 313% of weapon damage in a 0.5 tile radius. Stacks up to 7 times, summoning 1 meteor per stack. All stacks are removed on using Meteor Slam or switching weapons.

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_chargestormkingsw.Name: AID_G_OnHit_ChargeStormKingSword
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_chargestormkingsw.ItemName: Hitting an enemy empowers Storm Wave to shoot a piercing wave of energy, dealing 245% of weapon damage. Stacks up to 7 times, increasing the width of the wave with each stack. All stacks are removed on using Storm Wave or switching weapons.

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_execute.Name: AID_G_OnHit_Execute
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_execute.ItemName: Damage dealt to enemies below 15% health will immediately kill them.

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_shieldregen.Name: AID_G_OnHit_ShieldRegen
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_shieldregen.ItemName: On hitting an enemy with this weapon regain 5.5% of damage dealt as shields.

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_shieldregenandmax.Name: AID_G_OnHit_ShieldRegenAndMaxShield
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_shieldregenandmax.ItemName: If this weapon hits an enemy, your shield is replenished for 3% of the damage dealt and you gain 20% max shields for 8 seconds

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_slowtofreeze.Name: AID_G_OnHit_SlowToFreeze
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_slowtofreeze.ItemName: Each hit applies a stack of slow. When an enemy reaches 10 stacks, they are frozen for 3 seconds

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_stack_stormkingas.Name: AID_G_OnHit_Stack_StormkingAssault
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_stack_stormkingas.ItemName: Hitting an enemy applies a charge. Building up to 5 charges or switching targets detonates the charges, dealing 100% of weapon damage to the target and nearby enemies. Each charge increases the radius, up to a max of 0.75 tiles.

Alteration:aid_g_onhit_stun_lovestruck.Name: AID_G_OnHit_Stun_Lovestruck
Alteration:aid_g_onhit_stun_lovestruck.ItemName: Keeping the bow drawn past max charge will fire an arrow that stuns the enemy for 10 seconds. Weapon damage will break this effect. Does not affect Bosses or enemies that have recently been Lovestruck.

Alteration:aid_g_onimpactbreak_dance.Name: AID_G_OnImpactBreak_Dance
Alteration:aid_g_onimpactbreak_dance.ItemName: Stunning or Knocking back an enemy with this weapon causes it and nearby enemies to dance for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Alteration:aid_g_onimpactbreak_dealdamag.Name: AID_G_OnImpactBreak_DealDamage
Alteration:aid_g_onimpactbreak_dealdamag.ItemName: Stunning or Knocking back an enemy deals them 12 base damage.

Alteration:aid_g_onimpactbreak_freeze.Name: AID_G_OnImpactBreak_Freeze
Alteration:aid_g_onimpactbreak_freeze.ItemName: Stunning or knocking back an enemy with this weapon causes nearby enemies to freeze for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been frozen, Mist Monsters, or Bosses. Can only occur every 1 second.

Alteration:aid_g_onimpact_spawnsparkburs.Name: AID_G_OnImpact_SpawnSparkBurst_M
Alteration:aid_g_onimpact_spawnsparkburs.ItemName: Stunning or Knocking back an enemy reduces your current health by 8% and deals 26-149 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.5 tile radius. Can only occur every 5 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onimpact_spawnsparkburs.Name: AID_G_OnImpact_SpawnSparkBurst_R
Alteration:aid_g_onimpact_spawnsparkburs.ItemName: Stunning or Knocking back an enemy reduces your current health by 12.5% and deals 29-127 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.75 tile radius. Can only occur every 6 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onkillstreak_frenzy.Name: AID_G_OnKillStreak_Frenzy
Alteration:aid_g_onkillstreak_frenzy.ItemName: Eliminating 5 enemies in 4 seconds activates Frenzy, giving the player and their tamed pet 25% bonus move speed and attack speed for 5 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onkill_chainlightning.Name: AID_G_OnKill_ChainLightning
Alteration:aid_g_onkill_chainlightning.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon causes chain lightning to strike up to 6 enemies. Requires the bow to be drawn back at least halfway.

Alteration:aid_g_onkill_chainlightning_r.Name: AID_G_OnKill_ChainLightning_Real
Alteration:aid_g_onkill_chainlightning_r.ItemName: Eliminating an enemy with this weapon causes chain lightning to strike up to 6 enemies.

Alteration:aid_g_onkill_dance.Name: AID_G_OnKill_Dance
Alteration:aid_g_onkill_dance.ItemName: Eliminating an enemy with this weapon causes nearby enemies to dance for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Alteration:aid_g_onkill_frenzy.Name: AID_G_OnKill_Frenzy
Alteration:aid_g_onkill_frenzy.ItemName: Eliminating a Mist Monster activates Frenzy, giving the player and their tamed pet 25% bonus move speed and attack speed for 12 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onkill_spawnretroscifir.Name: AID_G_OnKill_SpawnRetroSciFiRing
Alteration:aid_g_onkill_spawnretroscifir.ItemName: Eliminating an enemy creates an expanding ring of damage. This can only occur every 4 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onkill_spawnsparkburst.Name: AID_G_OnKill_SpawnSparkBurst
Alteration:aid_g_onkill_spawnsparkburst.ItemName: Eliminating an enemy with this weapon reduces your current health by 8% and deals 26-151 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.5 tile radius. Can only occur every 3 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onmeleecrit_pistolheads.ItemName: On crit, increase pistol headshot damage by 40% for 15 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_onmeleehitstreak_aoe_fr.ItemName: Every 8th hit cause a Freeze around the character.

Alteration:aid_g_onmeleehit_stackbuff_cr.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +6 Critical Rating for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Alteration:aid_g_onmeleehit_stackbuff_da.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +6% Damage for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Alteration:aid_g_onmeleehit_stackbuff_fi.Name: AID_G_OnMeleeHit_StackBuff_FireRate
Alteration:aid_g_onmeleehit_stackbuff_fi.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +6% Attack Speed for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Alteration:aid_g_onmeleehit_stackbuff_mo.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants +6% Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

Alteration:aid_g_onmeleehit_stack_aoe_st.ItemName: Every 8th hit cause a stun around the character.

Alteration:aid_g_onmeleekill_regenshield.Name: AID_G_OnMeleeKill_RegenShields

Alteration:aid_g_onrangedfire_stackbuff_.ItemName: Each shot fired grants +1.8 Critical Rating for 1 second. Stacks up to 15 times.

Alteration:aid_g_onrangedfire_stackbuff_.ItemName: Each shot fired grants +1.8% Damage for 1 second. Stacks up to 15 times.

Alteration:aid_g_onrangedfire_stackbuff_.ItemName: Each shot fired grants +3.5% Shield for 5 seconds. Stacks up to 10 times.

Alteration:aid_g_onrangedhitstreak_dance.Name: AID_G_OnRangedHitStreak_Dance
Alteration:aid_g_onrangedhitstreak_dance.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon 6 times causes it and nearby enemies to dance for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Alteration:aid_g_onrangedhitstreak_dance.Name: AID_G_OnRangedHitStreak_DanceAfflict
Alteration:aid_g_onrangedhitstreak_dance.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon has a small chance to cause it and nearby enemies to dance and take fire affliction damage for a short duration. Does not affect enemies that have recently been dancing. Dance does not affect Mist Monsters or Bosses.

Alteration:aid_g_onreload_spawnsparkburs.Name: AID_G_OnReload_SpawnSparkBurst
Alteration:aid_g_onreload_spawnsparkburs.ItemName: Reloading reduces your current health by 12.5%. On the next enemy hit, deal 29-132 base damage based on the percentage of your missing health in a 0.75 tile radius.

Alteration:aid_g_rangeddmgvsfire.ItemName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against fire elemental enemies.

Alteration:aid_g_rangeddmgvsice.Name: AID_G_RangedDmgVsIce
Alteration:aid_g_rangeddmgvsice.ItemName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against water elemental enemies.

Alteration:aid_g_rangeddmgvslightning.Name: AID_G_RangedDmgVsLightning
Alteration:aid_g_rangeddmgvslightning.ItemName: Weapon hits deal 44% bonus damage against nature elemental enemies.

Alteration:aid_g_ranged_affliction_v2.Name: AID_G_Ranged_Affliction_V2
Alteration:aid_g_ranged_affliction_v2.ItemName: +10% Weapon Damage. Causes Affliction damage for 6 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_ranged_chainbullet.Name: AID_G_Ranged_ChainBullet

Alteration:aid_g_ranged_headshotstreak_d.Name: AID_G_Ranged_HeadShotStreak_DmgBonus_V2
Alteration:aid_g_ranged_headshotstreak_d.ItemName: Getting 5 headshots in a row increases ranged weapon damage +30% for 10 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_ranged_headshot_buffswo.Name: AID_G_Ranged_HeadShot_BuffSwordCritRating
Alteration:aid_g_ranged_headshot_buffswo.ItemName: Headshot eliminations boost critical hit chance with sword attacks for 15 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_ranged_headshot_explode.Name: AID_G_Ranged_HeadShot_ExplodeOnDeath_V2
Alteration:aid_g_ranged_headshot_explode.ItemName: Headshot eliminations cause an explosion, damaging enemies within 0.5 tiles for 30% weapon damage.

Alteration:aid_g_ranged_istargeting_dmgb.Name: AID_G_Ranged_IsTargeting_DmgBuff_V2
Alteration:aid_g_ranged_istargeting_dmgb.ItemName: +30% Weapon Damage when aiming down sights

Alteration:aid_g_ranged_onenemykilled_fa.Name: AID_G_Ranged_OnEnemyKilled_FasterReload_V2
Alteration:aid_g_ranged_onenemykilled_fa.ItemName: +10% Reload Speed per enemy killed, up to a maximum of +50% Reload Speed

Alteration:aid_g_shrapnel.Name: AID_G_Shrapnel
Alteration:aid_g_shrapnel.ItemName: On hit, bullet splinters into shrapnel, dealing 40% damage in a cone behind target (1.5 second cooldown).

Alteration:aid_g_standstill_stackbuff_da.Name: AID_G_StandStill_StackBuff_Damage
Alteration:aid_g_standstill_stackbuff_da.ItemName: Standing in place for 2 seconds grants +11% Damage. Stacks up to 5 times.  Moving from that position removes the effect completely.

Alteration:aid_g_standstill_stackbuff_da.Name: AID_G_StandStill_StackBuff_DamageVsMist
Alteration:aid_g_standstill_stackbuff_da.ItemName: Standing in place for 2 seconds grants +17% Damage vs Mist Monsters. Stacks up to 5 times.  Moving from that position removes the effect completely.

Alteration:aid_g_standstill_stackbuff_gr.Name: AID_G_StandStill_StackBuff_GrantShield
Alteration:aid_g_standstill_stackbuff_gr.ItemName: Standing in place for 1 second regenerates 10% of your max shield value.

Alteration:aid_g_stormkinglaunchercharge.Name: AID_G_StormKingLauncherCharge
Alteration:aid_g_stormkinglaunchercharge.ItemName: Charging this weapon causes the laser to split and chain to multiple targets on hitting. Longer charge times increase the number of splits, up to a max of 3. Charged shots generate more heat and consume more ammo.

Alteration:aid_g_stormkingpistolhomingpr.Name: AID_G_StormKingPistolHomingProjectiles
Alteration:aid_g_stormkingpistolhomingpr.ItemName: Fires homing projectiles that seek out the target's head. Aiming down sights increases the lock-on range from 4 tiles to 12, but decreases fire rate by 50%.

Alteration:aid_g_twokillstreak_firepool_.Name: AID_G_TwoKillStreak_FirePool_V2
Alteration:aid_g_twokillstreak_firepool_.ItemName: If two enemies are eliminated within 5 seconds of each other a pool of fire spawns on the ground.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_hitstreak_aoe_dm.Name: AID_G_Weapon_HitStreak_AOE_Dmg_V2
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_hitstreak_aoe_dm.ItemName: Landing 5 hits in a row on a single target causes a small explosion damaging enemies within 0.5 tiles of the target for 70% damage.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_melee_ondmgrecei.Name: AID_G_Weapon_Melee_OnDmgReceived_DmgBuff_V2
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_melee_ondmgrecei.ItemName: 5 attacks from enemies give you a 20% melee damage increase on your next attack.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_ondmgdealt_givee.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnDmgDealt_GiveEnergy_V2
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_ondmgdealt_givee.ItemName: Damage dealt with this weapon recovers 5 energy. This can happen once every 4 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_ondmgdealt_gives.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnDmgDealt_GiveShield_V2
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_ondmgdealt_gives.ItemName: Damage dealt with this weapon recovers 10% of maximum shield. This can happen once every 3 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_ondmg_afflictede.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnDmg_AfflictedEnemy_KnockbackAOE_V2
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_ondmg_afflictede.ItemName: Hitting an afflicted target causes a small Knockback AOE around them (5s cooldown).

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_ondmg_applysnare.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnDmg_ApplySnare_V2
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_ondmg_applysnare.ItemName: Damage dealt with this weapon snares the target by 30% for 6 seconds.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onfire_damagesta.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnFire_DamageStack
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onfire_damagesta.ItemName: Every 10th round fired increases weapon damage by 15%, stacking up to 4 times.  Reloading removes the effect.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onhit_energynova.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnHit_EnergyNova
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onhit_energynova.ItemName: After 6 hits, trigger an explosion, dealing 106% weapon damage in a 0.5 tile radius.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onkill_spawn_fir.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnKill_Spawn_Firework_V2
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onkill_spawn_fir.ItemName: On kill: Spawn Roman Candle at enemy location (8s cooldown).

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onkill_spawn_hea.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnKill_Spawn_HealthPickUps
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onkill_spawn_hea.ItemName: Eliminating enemies with this weapon can spawn healing candy pick ups.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onkill_spawn_hea.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnKill_Spawn_HealthPickUps_Gumdrops
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onkill_spawn_hea.ItemName: Eliminating enemies with this weapon can spawn healing gumdrop pick ups.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onreload_damageb.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnReload_DamageBuff
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onreload_damageb.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon grants a 1.7% weapon damage and 1% reload speed increase for 2 seconds, stacking up to 25 times.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onreload_damages.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnReload_DamageStack
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onreload_damages.ItemName: Each bullet reloaded grants a 16% damage bonus, stacking up to 5 times.  The first bullet to hit an enemy after reloading deals all of the extra damage.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onreload_explode.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnReload_Explode
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onreload_explode.ItemName: Hitting an enemy with this weapon marks them as a target, stacking with each hit.  Upon reload each marked target explodes in a 0.5 tile radius dealing 65% of weapon damage dealt per mark applied and removes all marks from the target.

Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onshieldbreak_in.Name: AID_G_Weapon_OnShieldBreak_IncendiaryAOE_V2
Alteration:aid_g_weapon_onshieldbreak_in.ItemName: Deals Fire damage to nearby enemies when your shield breaks

Alteration:aid_g_woosh.Name: AID_G_Woosh
Alteration:aid_g_woosh.ItemName: After 3 eliminations, gain +28% movement speed and +52% damage for 8 seconds.
